page.title: About Us - AngoraSix
page.description: Learn about the story, vision, and values behind AngoraSix — a cooperative platform to create and manage projects in a decentralized way.

hero.title: Redefining Collaboration
hero.subtitle: A platform where we all share ownership, where transparency guides decisions, and where every project has the potential to change the world.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: AngoraSix was born out of frustration—watching great ideas fade away for lack of support or being reshaped to meet investor demands.
story.paragraph2: We believe there’s a better way to build solutions: cooperatively, transparently, and in a decentralized manner—without arbitrary hierarchies and where every contributor is fairly valued.
story.paragraph3: AngoraSix is proof of this model in action. From day one, our project has been open source and collectively shaped. The rules, tools, and values are not just features—we live by them.
story.birth: This is how AngoraSix came to life

vision.title: Vision
vision.content: To redefine how we create solutions by promoting holistic development—both personal and social.

mission.title: Mission
mission.content: We want to show the world an alternative to traditional project management—a model that enables people to bring great ideas to life in a cooperative, decentralized way, while uplifting human value and encouraging deeper personal growth.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide every decision we make

transparency.title: Trust & Transparency
transparency.description: To grow, we need trust—in the platform, in people, and in the projects themselves. Transparency is the foundation of every strong relationship.

purpose.title: Meaning & Purpose
purpose.description: We want people to dedicate their time and energy to things that truly matter to them. Every project should have a clear purpose.

community.title: Community
community.description: Being part of something bigger, working toward a shared goal cooperatively and sustainably. A more human, natural way to connect.

evolution.title: Evolution & Originality
evolution.description: A different paradigm, an alternative path. Progress and growth—but not by blindly following the traditional model of 'success'.

trust.title: Invitation to Create
trust.description: We want to inspire people to start, to innovate, and to act from ideals, dreams, and values. To look up—not down.

simplicity.title: Simplicity
simplicity.description: Returning to simpler ways of relating. Replacing material ambition with a sense of meaning and peace.

community.title: Our Community
community.subtitle: Meet some of the people who are part of AngoraSix
community.philosophy: At AngoraSix, there are no hierarchies or employees. We are co-creators contributing based on our own skills and passions.
